description: Visitors to the island will either be tested at the border or have to self-isolate for 14 days.
title: Coronavirus: Jersey to reopen borders on 3 July
title_page: Coronavirus: Jersey to reopen borders on 3 July - BBC News
maintext: Those who test negative for coronavirus will be released from self-isolation, as long as they do not return positive results when tested on their fourth and seventh days on the island.
